p: The GC conditions are presented as follows: J and W 122-5532 quartz capillary column (30 m × 250 μm × 0.25 μm); an inlet temperature of 250 °C; oven temperature was maintained at 60 °C for 1 min, after which it was elevated by 2 °C/min to 130 °C and subsequently elevated by 5 °C/min to 240 °C, at which the temperature was maintained for 1 min; a split ratio of 15:1; carrier gas (99.999% He); a velocity of 0.95 mL/min; and an injection volume of 1 μL. The MS conditions are presented as follows: electron impact (EI) ion source; an ion source temperature of 230 °C; an MS quadrupole temperature of 150 °C; and a mass scan range of 30–500 amu.
